_sText:
Extraxt this file to the Counsterstrike Source maps folder

================================================================================
* LEVEL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TITLE                   : DE_KILO II HDR
FILENAME                : de_kilo2_hdr.bsp
AUTHOR                  : Bluestrike McQueen
DATE                    : 26 februari 2007 
GAME                    : half-Life 2 COunter-Strike Source.
EMAIL ADDRESS           : Bluestrike@bluestrike.be
HOMEPAGE URL            : http://www.bluestrike.be
 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* LEVEL DESCRIPTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map is set in a artic/tundra envoirement, a old soviet submarine base with
diesel submarines (Kilo class)
 
NEW TEXTURES            : Some custom skins, terrain textures.
NEW MODELS		: Railings, lamppole, submarine, torpedos, ...

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CONSTRUCTION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
MAP BASE                : de_kilo for HL1.
MAP VERSION		: build 101 
PREFABS USED            : none
EDITOR(S) USED          : Hammer 4,0, Softimage XSI and Paint Shop Pro 
OTHER UTILITIES USED    : none 
KNOWN BUGS              : none.
 
COMPILE MACHINE         : Core2duo Qx6700 2gb DDR2
 
compile time		: 1.5 hours (-final compile)
time spend on building 	: 3 months along with a second map
			  1.3 release 2 years aftter initial release.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* OTHER LEVELS BY THE AUTHOR *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Too many to name but here is a pick:

cs_beirut (Counter-strike)
de_fort (Counter-strike)

Nickrock (Farcry singleplay)
  
cs_beirut 2 (Counter-strike source)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS / ADDITIONAL INFORMATION *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fixes 1.2
- Added additional spawnpoints to support up to 33 vs 33 on 64 player servers.
- Double door from lockersroom to hangaar for the heavyer player load.
- Added additional crates outside as extra cover around the hotspot
  with possible heavyer player load.
- Gfx change: added a texture on top side of the bureau and locker rooms.

Fixes 1.3:
- Added hdr support.
- Added 'green' radar image
- Added custom models
- general tweaks.


 
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* CREDITS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Spine for the terrain and model skins. http://www.spineroyal.com/
Valve for their awesome game and support
Thanks to all the tutorial makers out there.
Thanks to the people who gave valuable feedback.


================================================================================
* COPYRIGHT / PERMISSIONS *
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Redistributing is allowed.

Bluestrike, Belgium.
